1370: Hille moved to Die lange straet3.D.3 after marriage.
Got married to Herbert at age 22 in 1370.
Gave birth to Hille in 1370 at age 22.
1372: Gave birth to Waldrada in 1372 at age 24.
1373: Gave birth to Alvericus in 1373 at age 25.
1376: Gave birth to Elberino in 1376 at age 28.
1377: Gave birth to Oudrauen in 1377 at age 29.

Has seen several of their children die.
